review_title: Very good but need more minigames
one_reviews_text: I tested this game by recommendation and this is fantastic, i really enjoied but i feel like need more minigames

I just installed and enjoied so much. Each game/Excercise can be feeled long (5 minutes) but the purpose is to stay focus on the task and get the better score you can. Will be super if developper can support Oculus Quest platform too.

The app is great fun and even if it doesn't train the brain it's a great 1st experience of VR. The only issue is it requires internet connection and the servers for the game seem to be down a lot so even if your internet is fine you can't do it if the server is down al day.

Really fun wholistic workout with an emphasis on keeping your mind sharp across cognitive, motor and analytical skills. The ability to track progress with scientific insight is the killer feature. Impressive, with lots of potential to take things much further. Highly recommended.

review_title: Great workout for your mind and body!
one_reviews_text: Awesome cognitive workout! Fun and engaging games to improve memory, motor skills and problem solving. I am looking forward to building these skills and measuring my progress.
